A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun movie.  Great looking.  Amazing special effects.  Unfortunately the story\, plot holes\, and inconsistencies with TFA and earlier moves can't be overlooked.  Rian Johnson did NOT pick up where JJ Abrams left off.  Abrams left some Chekhov's guns ready to go off that never did\, and it seemed it was in the name of 'shock value'.   I don't believe Johnson cared or even checked to see if his movie was a proper sequel.  The trilogy has one more chance to close loops and explain things.
